section.title: How to get to this page
section.p: Logged in Mingle users can always click the profile link located at the top of each Mingle page to go to their user profile page.
Mingle administrators or project administrators can open any user's profile page by clicking a user's display name on the Manage user page or the Team page.

section.title: What you can do on this page
section.p: All Mingle users can manage their own user profile. The page lets you manage your profile information and personal settings.
Mingle administrators can manage any user's profile (see above). In addition, they can:

item.cref: Add a user to multiple projects

section.p: Project administrators have restricted permissions when they look at other another's profile. They can:

item.cref: Add a user to multiple projects

section.title: Viewing profile details
section.p: To update these fields, click the "Edit" button and update them on edit profile page.
section.note: Project administrators can view another's profile information but do not have permission to update.

section.title: Changing password
section.p: If Mingle is used to manage passwords, users can change their password on their user profile page. Mingle administrators can also change another user's password.

steps.title: To change a Mingle user's password
steps.item: Go to your profile page, or the profile page of another user.

screenshot.alttext: Change password button on user profile

item.note: Mingle requires a password format of at least 5 characters, including a number and a symbol character.

steps.item: Click Change Password to change the password.

section.title: Viewing project assignments
section.p: On the "Projects" tab, you will see the Mingle projects you are assigned to and your project permissions. Mingle administrators and project administrators can view this information.
section.note: Mingle administrators and project administrators can also add a user to multiple projects.

section.title: Adding a user to multiple projects
Managing personal favorites
section.p: Users can manage their own personal favorites from this tab. Mingle administrators can manage another's personal favorites as well.

steps.title: To view and delete personal favorites:
steps.item: Go to your profile page or the profile page of another user.
You will see the personal favorites that belong to the profile.
Click the "Delete" link to delete a favorite.
